item.description:
Hi everyone, I hope you can join us for a" Murdery Mystery Party" at the Governors Inn.

This is a social  but active game that we play, this is not a show that you watch but a game where you participate. You will be wandering around in the dark, bumping into people, laughing all the way!

You must wear all black clothing.

You must not be afraid of the dark and or bumbing into new people!

This is not achildren event and please come prepared to play so dress in appropriate clothing as you might be lying on the floor.

We will be having dinner there at: 5:30 pm

More details will coming.

Other meetup groups will be attending.

$5 donation appreciated.

Peter
item.name: Murdery Mystery Party
